STOCK001-DN245120-11485049,Contract,"Stockport Metropolitan Borough Council",Awarded,2018-05-18T16:31:09Z,"Inter-Country Adoption Pre-Assessment Service","This contract is to provide a direct delivery service of Pre-Assessment for Inter Country Adoption (ICA).
The Provider would be required to deal with all ICA queries that are made from the list of Local Authorities listed at Section 5 of this specification
Quotations are invited for the Inter Country Adoption Pre-Assessment Service, in accordance with the attached terms and conditions of the council.

column2: The Service will be provided for the following Local Authorities, whether or not services are delivered through a Regional Adoption Agency at the commencement of the contract or in the future:

column1: To provide a Pre-Assessment Inter Country Adoption Service Users on behalf of the Local Authorities (stipulated in Section 5 of the attached specification) who are represented at the North West Adoption Leadership Board, including by a Regional Adoption Agency.

The service will include advice, information and counselling to Service Users seeking to adopt a child(ren) from outside the United Kingdom. This will include parents, guardians and relatives who wish to adopt a child(ren) from overseas.  Any services purchased will only be from the range of services the Provider is registered to provide.",,,"North West","85000000 ","Grace Power",grace.power@star-procurement.gov.uk,"Trafford Council","Trafford Town Hall, Talbot Road",Stretford,"M32 0TH",England,"+44 7976959806",http://www.stockport.gov.uk/,,,,10/06/2017,29/04/2019,20/03/2017,NO,,No,No,No,Services,15000,15000,31/03/2017,30000,"[InterCountry Adoption Centre|22 Union St, Barnet EN5 4HZ|NONE||No|No]",,05/06/2017,31/03/2020,"Open ",

prj_LBNew_3442,Contract,"Newham People's Trust Fund",Awarded,2016-02-23T13:34:03Z,"Inter-Country Adoption Support Service","The London Borough of Newham (LBN) has awarded a contract for the provision of assessment and adoption services for prospective inter-country adopters who are resident in the Borough.

column2: Information, Advice and Guidance (IAG) to prospective inter-country adopters;
an assessment, vetting, and matching process for those who wish to proceed with inter-country adoption, including some post adoption support and consultation; and

access to dedicated practitioner support.",,,London,"85000000 ","Simon Whitlock",simon.whitlock@newham.gov.uk,"Newham Dockside","1000 Dockside Road",London,"E16 2QU",England,,,,,,08/02/2016,28/02/2021,19/08/2015,NO,,Yes,Yes,No,Services,27824.15,75000,08/02/2016,27824.15,"[Intercountry Adoption Centre|22 Union Street
